title: The Bird who is a clown
creator_credit: John Walker and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Introduces the island Daphne Major of the Galapagos Islands which is a small island and nesting ground for hundrreds of Blue-footed Booby birds. Emphasises the mating and upbringing of the young in order to illustrate the development of the Booby and to reveal its behaviour patterns. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
